channel.title: Comments on: SQL Connections Suburban Chicago May 2010 Meeting (SSIS Basics)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.content:encoded:
I think it went very well and I can’t wait to do my next one. Room was very interactive and attentive the entire session. I could have pushed it a bit longer to cover some other things I wanted to though. Questions that came up were really good though and I moved with the way the room felt.

I’m writing a follow up to it with the slides and dtsx that went along with it all. Will let you know when it’s up.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Thanks Denis! Looking forward to it.
